GSD.product_version: versions from v3.1 to before v4.14.300
GSD.description:
net/x25: Fix skb leak in x25_lapb_receive_frame()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit dfcfbe4f2e4b2c81cff4e79b48502d97fda73118, it was introduced in version v3.1 by commit cb101ed2c3c7c0224d16953fe77bfb9d6c2cb9df. For more details please see the references link.
